entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Swift Current
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swift Current Airport 07:36 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -9.6°C
Wind: NE 33 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
